titleStmt.title: A supplication made to the Priuy Counsel by Mr Walter Trauers
titleStmt.author: Travers, Walter, 1547 or 8-1635.
England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold by John Barnes dwelling neere Holborne Conduit [, London],

notesStmt.note: The original controversy took place in 1586.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
